I've been seeing a peer at IP 45.59.67.242 appear to repeatedly freeze incoming block downloads. 
This appears to be timeout related as nearly exactly 20 minutes pass between the inv(2016-02-25 03:52:02.639084) and the download timeout(2016-02-25 04:12:02.649818).

I'm not seeing a "Requesting block" before the timeout on the block download that freezes however.

Best I can tell bitcoind thinks it's downloading a block starting at the inv but actually isn't at all.
